column5: This historic downtown home is great for a quick getaway but can also accommodate anyone needing an extended stay. Guests have access to the entire upstairs apartment with own private entry. Very simple and reminiscent of an early 1900's era home. Comes complete with all the essentials-range/oven, microwave, refrigerator, dishware/full kitchen, 2 cozy beds(excellent top quality mattresses), dining area, fast WiFi, Cable, living room with 32 inch TV and large bathroom with amenities.
